overview: Egi (Jeffry Waworuntu) has to work in a garage to help his  family. Silvy (Dian Nitami), a rocker, and Nanang (Cok  Simbara), a band member, are both children of wealthy parents that pay very little attention to them. These three friends struggle to stay together despite the problems and challenges that come their way.
title: Zig Zag (Anak Jalanan)
